base_description: Rectangular object with green and black colors.
part_description: Consists of a green rectangular end and a black central strip on a gray base.
internal_interaction_description: The green end cap securely attaches to the gray base, providing structural support. The black strip is embedded centrally along the length of the gray base, possibly for functional or aesthetic purposes.
external_interaction_description: The object can be handled or manipulated by people, possibly used as a tool or component in a larger assembly. Its flat base allows it to rest stably on surfaces.
